physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient had scattered light red rashes on both lower extremities, which did not protrude from the skin surface or fade under pressure. He developed bilateral pitting edema in the lower extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The rash initially presented as scattered light red rashes which later extended to involve the knee joints. Bilateral pitting edema in the lower extremities developed.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral pitting edema in the lower extremities.
